title: The Man She Loves To Hate
description: Three reasons to keep away from Cole Rees…1. My mom had a scorching affair with his dad—just think how awkward that "meet the family" would be…2. His arrogance drives me mad—he might be a gorgeous billionaire, but I hate how he knows it!3. Every time he touches me I go up in flames…and it's utterly terrifying.Come on, a fling with the man I love to hate? Like that would ever work out…
author: Kelly Hunter
